subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Goalkeeper Hope Solo, whose remarks critical of Coach Greg Ryan got her dismissed from the United States team at the Women’s World Cup, is on the roster for a three-game series with Mexico. The teams play Saturday at the Edward Jones Dome in St. Louis, and Solo and goalie Briana Scurry were listed yesterday on Ryan’s 20-player roster.
